brainlink.attributeslist.title: Brain Link Attributes
brainlink.config.title: Brain Link Settings
brainlink.configscreen.title: Brain Link Settings
brainlink.modifyattribute.title: Attribute Settings
brainlink.devicescreen.title: Device Settings
brainlink.deviceselection.title: Select Device
brainlink.eegscreen.title: EEG Settings
brainlink.channelscreen.title: Select Channel
brainlink.emotionsscreen.title: Select Emotion Data Type
brainlink.wavesscreen.title: Select Brain Wave
brainlink.rawpercentscreen.title: Select Raw or Percent
brainlink.pathrootscreen.title: Select Data Source
brainlink.updatedelay.tooltip: Delay between updates of the player's attribute values.
brainlink.datatimeused.tooltip: Determines how many seconds of recent data to use for calculating a baseline for the brain activity.
brainlink.scalar.tooltip:
Controls how much the attribute is affected by brain activity.
Higher values mean stronger effects.
0 disables the effect.
brainlink.invertscalar.tooltip: Inverts the scalar so that the attribute scales in the opposite direction of brain activity.
brainlink.maxmultiplier.tooltip: The maximum multiplier for this attribute. If less than Min Multiplier, Min Multiplier will be used instead.
brainlink.minmultiplier.tooltip: The minimum multiplier for this attribute.
brainlink.threshold.tooltip: The attribute is only affected above this level of relative brain activity, where 1 is the user's baseline brain activity.
brainlink.invertthreshold.tooltip: Inverts the threshold so that the attribute is only affected when the brain activity is below the threshold.
brainlink.o1.tooltip: O1 is the back left electrode.
brainlink.o2.tooltip: O2 is the back right electrode.
brainlink.t3.tooltip: T3 is the middle left electrode.
brainlink.t4.tooltip: T4 is the middle right electrode.
brainlink.signal.tooltip: The raw electrical signals from the brain.
brainlink.waves.tooltip: The different types of brain waves.
brainlink.setdatasource.tooltip: Set which type of brain activity to use for game interaction.
brainlink.constantmovementfov.tooltip: If true, player FOV will be constant while under the effect of mod-related speed changes.
